TopicTitle: How do I make Plug Ins?

Articles.Content: I\'m not sure if this is in the right place, but other people asked questions here and I couldn\'t think of a better place. I would like to start making plug ins because I have many ideas but I don\'t know how. Can someone write up some kind of guide that makes it possible for people to learn how to make plug ins for .14 and up?
Before you make any plugins, you have to understand C# and then know how to code things for KSP. There is no easy 'guide'.

Check the Wiki, start by follow the guide for setting up your particular IDE (Only VS2010 and MonoDevelop atm)

http://kspwiki.nexisonline.net/wiki/Part_Modules

Where you go from there is all up to you.

I suggest following some C# tutorials.
